items.title: Raw emotions as mourners attend Mass for Swiss bar fire victims
items.title_zh: 瑞士酒吧火灾受害者弥撒时,
items.summary: In the snow-dusted street outside St Christopher's Church, hundreds joined a special Sunday Mass for the victims of the fire that tore through Le Constellation bar on New Year's Eve.
items.summary_zh: 在圣克里斯托弗教堂外的被雪弄的街道上,有上百人加入了特别的"周日弥撒",为元旦夜通过"星座"酒吧撕裂的火灾受害者.

items.title: ポータブル電源 リチウムイオン電池発火事故で安全基準策定へ

items.summary_zh: “锂电池火”

items.title: Spies, drones and blowtorches: How the US captured Maduro
items.title_zh: 间谍、无人机和吹哨机: 美军如何俘虏马杜罗
items.summary: For months, US spies had been monitoring Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro's every move.
items.summary_zh: 几个月来,美国间谍一直在监视委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗的一举一动。

items.title: ベネズエラ大統領拘束 側近ら現体制維持の姿勢も先行き不透明
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉总统的克制 维持现有系统的态度也是不透明的

items.title: Danish PM tells Trump to stop 'threats' against Greenland
items.title_zh: 丹麦首相让特朗普停止对格陵兰的"威胁"
items.summary: Denmark's prime minister has told Donald Trump to "stop the threats" about taking over Greenland.
items.summary_zh: 丹麦首相告诉唐纳德·特朗普"停止"关于接管格陵兰的威胁".

items.title: 犯罪被害者や遺族を弁護士が継続支援する新制度 13日から開始

items.summary_zh: 日本和中国对峙 聚焦两国是否找到改善关系的线索

items.title: Police identify all 40 victims of Swiss bar fire
items.title_zh: 警方查明所有40名瑞士酒吧火灾受害者的身份
items.summary: The bodies of the 40 victims of a bar fire in the Swiss ski resort of Crans-Montana on New Year's Eve have been identified by police.
items.summary_zh: 新年前夕瑞士克兰斯-蒙塔纳滑雪胜地发生酒吧起火的40名被害者的尸体被警方辨认出.

items.title: At least 30 killed in attack on Nigeria village
items.title_zh: 在袭击尼日利亚村庄时至少30人被炸死
items.summary: Armed men have violently stormed a village in Nigeria's Niger state, killing at least 30 people and looting shops, state authorities have said.
items.summary_zh: 武装分子暴力袭击了尼日利亚尼日尔州一村庄,造成至少30人死亡并抢劫商店,州当局表示.

items.title: Can Maduro's trusted lieutenant now work for Trump?
items.title_zh: 马杜罗信任的中尉现在能为特朗普工作了吗?
items.summary: Many of those who tuned in to US President Donald Trump's news conference on Saturday were probably hoping to hear dramatic details of how US forces seized Venezuela's leader, Nicolás Maduro, in a pre-dawn raid.
items.summary_zh: 许多人在周六的美国总统特朗普的记者招待会中,

items.title: Who is Cilia Flores, Venezuela's first lady captured by the US?
items.title_zh: 谁是Cilia Flores 委内瑞拉被美国抓走的第一夫人?
items.summary: When US forces conducted a night raid on the Venezuelan capital Caracas, they didn't just drag President Nicolás Maduro from his compound and put him on a boat to New York - they took his wife too.
items.summary_zh: 当美军对委内瑞拉首都加拉加斯进行夜间突袭时,他们并不只是把尼古拉斯·马杜罗总统从他的大院中拖出,把他放上去纽约的一艘船——他们也带走了他的妻子.

items.title: From Caracas 'fort' to New York court: Maduro's capture in pictures and maps
items.title_zh: 从加拉加斯'fort'到纽约法庭:马杜罗在图片和地图上的捕捉
items.summary: The US says its military operation to capture Venezuela's president took months of planning, but when Donald Trump gave the order to launch, "Operation Absolute Resolve" only lasted about 150 minutes.
items.summary_zh: 美国称其抓捕委内瑞拉总统的军事行动花费了数月的计划时间,但当唐纳德·特朗普下达发动命令后"绝对决心行动"只持续了约150分钟.

items.title: Bowen: Trump's action could set precedent for authoritarian powers across globe
items.title_zh: 博文:特朗普的行动可以为全球的专制权力开创先例.
items.summary: With the seizure of Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro, Donald Trump has demonstrated more powerfully than ever his belief in the power of his will, backed by raw US military force. On his orders the US has Maduro behind bars and now will "run" Venezuela.
items.summary_zh: 随着委内瑞拉领导人尼科拉斯·马杜罗被夺取,唐纳德·特朗普在生前的美国军事力量支持下,比以往更有力地展示了他对意志力量的信念. 根据他的命令,美国将马杜罗关入监狱,现在将"跑"委内瑞拉.

items.title: 能登半島地震から2年 和倉温泉 全館休業続く老舗旅館のいま

items.summary_zh: 受影响地区的记录

items.title: Thousands stranded across Europe as Greece airspace disrupted
items.title_zh: 随着希腊空域被破坏,数千人滞留在欧洲各地
items.summary: Thousands of passengers are stranded across Europe after a communications failure forced Greece to close its airspace, causing widespread cancellations and delays.
items.summary_zh: 数以千计的乘客被滞留在欧洲各地,因为一次通信故障迫使希腊关闭了领空,造成广泛的取消和延误.

items.title: Video shows Maduro's arrival in US and journey into custody
items.title_zh: 视频显示马杜罗抵达美国 并被拘押
items.summary: Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro and his wife Cilia Flores have been placed in custody at a New York detention centre after he was captured during US strikes on Caracas.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗和妻子Cilia Flores在美国袭击加拉加斯时被俘后被拘押在纽约拘留中心.

items.title: Brigitte Bardot Foundation issues warning about scam memorabilia
items.title_zh: Brigitte Bardot基金会发布警告,
items.summary: The charity Brigitte Bardot established has issued a warning about "scam" merchandise purporting to fund its work following the French actress's death.
items.summary_zh: 成立的慈善机构"布里吉特·巴多"(Brigitte Bardot)曾发出警告,称"scam"商品旨在为法国女演员死后的工作提供资金.

items.title: UK and France bomb underground IS arms bunker in Syria
items.title_zh: 英国和法国轰炸叙利亚的地下IS武器掩体
items.summary: Royal Air Force Typhoon jets have joined French aircraft in a joint strike on an underground arms cache in Syria used by the Islamic State group (IS), the UK Ministry of Defence says.
items.summary_zh: 英国国防部称,皇家空军的台风喷气机与法国飞机联合打击了伊斯兰国集团(IS)在叙利亚使用的地下武器储藏所.

items.title: 'Deeply shocked': World leaders react to US attack on Venezuela
items.title_zh: "深感震惊": 世界领导人对美国袭击委内瑞拉的反应
items.summary: Leaders around the world have responded with a mix of condemnation and support to the US capture of Venezuela's President Nicolás Maduro.
items.summary_zh: 全世界领导人的反应是谴责和支持美国俘虏委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗。

items.title: Trump warning over Iran protests 'reckless' says foreign minister
items.title_zh: 外相说,
items.summary: Donald Trump's warning that the US will intervene if peaceful protesters are killed was "reckless and dangerous", Iran's foreign minister has said.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗外交部长唐纳德·特朗普警告,如果和平抗议者被杀死,美国将进行干预,这"无畏而危险".

items.title: How UK plush toy Jellycat conquered China
items.title_zh: 英国的花糖玩具 Jellycat如何征服中国
items.summary: Stella Huang bought her first Jellycat plush toy when she lost her job during the pandemic.
items.summary_zh: 丝黛拉 黄 Huang在大流行期间失去工作时买下她的第一个"Jellycat pluh"玩具.

items.title: Watch: 'I'm so happy' - Venezuelans in the US react to Maduro's capture
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉民众对马杜罗被捕的反应:
items.summary: US President Donald Trump says the US launched strikes on Venezuela and captured its President Nicolás Maduro.
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普说,美国对委内瑞拉发动了打击并俘虏了委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗.

items.title: Why has Trump attacked Venezuela and taken Maduro?
items.title_zh: 为什么特朗普攻击委内瑞拉并夺取了马杜罗?
items.summary: US President Donald Trump says the US is going to "run" Venezuela "until such time as we can do a safe, proper and judicious transition".
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普(Donald Trump)表示,美国将"运行"委内瑞拉","直到我们能够进行安全,适当和明智的过渡".

items.title: Trump on Venezuela: 'We are going to run the country'
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉的特朗普:"我们要管理这个国家".
items.summary: President Donald Trump announced that the US will run Venezuela until a 'proper transition can take place.'
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普宣布,

items.title: Explosions and smoke at La Guaira port
items.title_zh: 拉瓜伊拉港的爆炸和烟雾
items.summary: Port La Guaira is Caracas' main conduit to the Caribbean Sea, located in Miranda state.
items.summary_zh: 拉瓜伊拉港是加拉加斯通向加勒比海的主要通道,位于米兰达州.

items.title: Watch: Over 100 firefighters on the scene of Denver blaze
items.title_zh: 看:丹佛大火现场有100多名消防员
items.summary: The Colorado city of Denver was lit up by enormous fire on Friday evening, with over 100 firefighters on the scene to battle the blaze.
items.summary_zh: 科罗拉多州城市丹佛在星期五晚间被巨大的火灾所点燃,现场有超过100名消防员来与大火进行战斗.

items.title: Sailors saved from going over edge of huge dam
items.title_zh: 水手们从大坝上逃出
items.summary: Footage shows the moment four men were pulled to safety after spending hours dangling off the edge of a 40m (130ft) dam in South Africa.
items.summary_zh: 4名男子在南非40米(130英尺)水坝边上被拖走,

items.title: Watch: Moment 400-pound runaway prop injures Disney employee
items.title_zh: 看着:400磅跑道具 伤害了迪士尼员工
items.summary: Footage shows the moment a worker at Walt Disney World was injured after being hit by a 400-lb (180kg) runaway fake boulder prop.
items.summary_zh: Footage显示一名在华特迪士尼世界(Walt Disney World)的工人被一辆400磅(180克)跑去的假巨石道具撞倒后受伤.

items.title: What are Russians hoping for in 2026, asks Steve Rosenberg
items.title_zh: 2026年俄国人希望什么,问史蒂夫·罗森伯格
items.summary: As the New Year holiday gets underway, the BBC's Russia editor Steve Rosenberg asks people on the streets of Moscow about their hopes for 2026 and how they see their future.
items.summary_zh: 随着新年假期的到来,BBC的俄罗斯编辑史蒂夫·罗森伯格(Steve Rosenberg)询问莫斯科街头的人们对2026年的希望,以及他们如何看待自己的未来.
